episodes.overview: Drew finds romance with Dawn, but their new relationship appears doomed because of her past.  They can't find any time alone because one of her ex-boyfriends seems to turn up every few minutes.

episodes.name: Drew's Girl Friday
episodes.overview: Drew panics when the other analyst leaves the company, as he fears his bosses will discover that he doesn't know how to do his job.  He hires a teenager to help improve his technical know-how.  Meanwhile, Steve moves in with Lewis and Oswald.  He drives them crazy with his constant crying and emotional comments as he tries to deal with the collapse of his marriage.

episodes.name: Drew Tries Hot Salsa
episodes.overview: Drew takes salsa lessons in the hopes of learning to dance for his wedding.  Kellie gets jealous when he becomes attracted to his instructor.  She confesses her feelings to Mimi, who tells her to keep quiet.  Drew practices dancing with Kellie and decides that he has a thing for her.  He wants to tell her how he feels; but ""unfortunately,"" he doesn't get a chance because her ex-husband, Daryl, barges in on them.

episodes.name: The Man in the Iron Chair
episodes.overview: Drew tries to keep Kellie away from Daryl, who is confined to a wheelchair after an auto accident and seems to regret the mistakes he made during their marriage.  However, Drew ends up looking as though as he is trying to hurt Daryl, and pushes the two closer together.  He decides that it isn't the right time to confess his feelings.

episodes.name: Drew Takes a Guilt Trip
episodes.overview: After Oswald fails his nursing school exam, Drew feels bad and helps him get a job at the web site.  Oswald finds a way to nearly destroy the entire business.  He ends up being reassigned to a job that he (sort of) knows how to do--delivering packages.  Mimi repeatedly sucks up to Traylor in an attempt to get on her good side after trying to kill her.

episodes.name: Blecch Sunday
episodes.overview: Drew's bosses ask him to do a live commercial for the web site during the Super Bowl broadcast.  Unfortunately, Drew's nerves get the better of him whenever he has to appear on camera.  His attempt to correct this leads to a disgusting mishap that is broadcast worldwide.

episodes.name: Turkeyspotting
episodes.overview: Larry encourages Drew to lose weight before attending one of his singles mixers.  Drew winds up giving up food altogether, but his crash diet has unintended side effects--he can't stop hallucinating about turkeys!

episodes.name: Suddenly No Summer
episodes.overview: Drew tries to improve his standing at work by taking a computer course over the summer.  The gang tempts him into blowing it off to take a trip to Florida.  Drew is wracked with guilt and his vacation, not surprisingly, turns out to be a disaster.

episodes.name: What's Love Got to Do With It?
episodes.overview: The gang takes part in a karaoke contest.  Drew tries to coach Kellie before her performance, but she gets so tired of his constant interference that she dumps him.  Drew winds up having to take the stage with an 11-year-old girl as his partner.

episodes.name: Two Girls for Every Boy
episodes.overview: Drew falls for a bisexual, who offers him a chance at a threesome with her new girlfriend, another ""old friend"" of Drew's.  Mimi lets Steve return home, but he fears that she will continue to punish him for having an affair.

episodes.name: Two Days of the Condo
episodes.overview: Drew cannot afford to get a birthday present for Kellie because he has spent all of his money on an engagement ring.  He learns of a condo that is available for free use for the weekend, but only for married couples.  Drew mock-proposes to Kellie and asks her to pose as his wife for the weekend.  Trouble arises when a man starts hitting on Kellie, leaving Drew jealous.

episodes.name: Lewis, You Can Drive My Car
episodes.overview: Drew gives Lewis his Christmas bonus, a used Rolls Royce.  However, the flashy car causes Lewis to undergo a strange personality transformation, and he can no longer be bothered to hang out with his longtime friends.

episodes.name: A Speedy Recovery
episodes.overview: Drew finds an unexpected romance after he and Speedy get involved with an animal therapy program at a hospital.  He agrees to loan Speedy to a dying woman, and sufficiently impresses the woman's granddaughter.  He finds the relationship may not be worth it when he learns that he may never see Speedy again.  Meanwhile, Oswald tries to land a date with Traylor.

episodes.name: A Means to an End
episodes.overview: Oswald and Lewis seek revenge against Drew after they discover that he gave away their Christmas gifts--handmade mugs--to a thrift store.  Drew winds up getting an unscheduled colonoscopy from a Russian veterinarian.

episodes.name: Drew Answers the Belle
episodes.overview: Oswald and Lewis put Drew's picture and phone number on Buzz Beer bottles in the hopes of landing him a wife.  Much to everyone's surprise, a southern belle responds to the campaign and expresses an interest in Drew.  Drew travels down south to meet the woman, Lily.  They hit it off, and Drew believes he may have finally found a wife.  He then discovers that she suffers from night terrors.

episodes.name: What Screams May Come
episodes.overview: Drew is left bruised and battered as Lily continues to suffer from night terrors.  He grows tired of the beatings, but is afraid to talk to her about her problem because he believes she would leave him.

episodes.name: Love is in the Air
episodes.overview: Drew decides to propose to Lily.  Mimi hopes to secure Gus's admission into an exclusive prep school by setting up Kellie with the school's headmaster.

episodes.name: The Bataan Wedding March
episodes.overview: As Drew prepares to marry Lily, his mother notes how upset Kellie seems and realizes that she has strong feelings for Drew.  She believes that Drew feels the same way about Kellie.  Drew and Lily go through with the wedding, but the union proves to be a brief one when they realize that they really are not right for each other.  Drew winds up sharing a dance with Kellie.

episodes.name: Drew Hunts Silver Fox
episodes.overview: Drew and Oswald get a little too competitive as they try to set up their mothers with an attractive eligible widower.

episodes.name: Sealed in a Kiss
episodes.overview: While taking a pregnancy quiz with Kellie, Drew recalls his father's death in a fall from the roof.  Drew was horrified to discover that he was never even mentioned in his dad's diary, and tried to prove himself by arranging for a lavish military-style funeral.  However, disaster struck when George accidentally wound up with a casket featuring the logo for the band Kiss.

episodes.name: Burning Down the House
episodes.overview: Mimi blames Drew after her house burns down, apparently as the result of a gift given to Gus by his uncle.  Oswald starts a change machine business.

episodes.name: Liar, Liar, House on Fire
episodes.overview: The gang tries to teach Gus to lie to an insurance adjuster so that Mimi can receive the claim on her house and be able to replace it.

episodes.name: Foos Rush In
episodes.overview: After Evan leaves for a yoga retreat, Traylor begins a romance with Scott as part of a power play to seize control of the office.  She puts an end to the laid-back work environment; and worst of all, takes away the foosball table!  Meanwhile, Lewis gets involved with the Warsaw's new cook.

episodes.name: Straight Eye for the Queer Guy
episodes.overview: Mimi encourages Drew to make friends with the gay parents of Gus's friend.  However, Drew winds up inadvertently splitting up the couple and finds himself as the "other man."

episodes.name: Sleeping with the Enemy
episodes.overview: Drew and Kellie's new relationship is threatened by their strong political differences.

episodes.name: Asleep at the Wheel
episodes.overview: After Tony the bus driver gets into an accident, he pleads with Drew to keep it a secret because he is close to retirement and doesn't want to risk being fired and losing his benefits package. Drew cannot do this because he fears for the passengers' safety, so he tries to convince Scott to give Tony another job.

episodes.name: Still Life with Freeloader
episodes.overview: Drew resorts to drastic action after Mimi's latest boyfriend moves into the house and begins mooching off of him.

episodes.name: Drew Thinks Inside the Box
episodes.overview: Drew is thrilled when he and Kellie decide to exchange keys.  However, he nearly thwarts the progress in their relationship when he ends up letting Scott use Kellie's place to cheat on Traylor.

episodes.name: Eye of the Leopard
episodes.overview: After learning that Gus's soccer team is in a league that has set things up to make sure that no one ever loses (to keep the kids from feeling bad), Drew tries to butt in, leading to disastrous results for his nephew.  Lewis and Oswald make the mistake of getting involved with Kellie's cousin, who turns out to be a kleptomaniac.

episodes.name: At Your Cervix
episodes.overview: Drew hopes to make a commitment to Kellie after they learn that she is pregnant.  However, she is unsure if this is the right decision.  Drew seeks her parents' help to change her mind, only to find that they are not exactly thrilled with the idea of having him as their son-in-law.

episodes.name: Baby Makes Stress
episodes.overview: Kellie is furious with Drew after he blows off an appointment to see their baby's first sonogram to go drinking with the guys.

episodes.name: No Booze for Drew
episodes.overview: As a sign of support, Drew pledges to stop drinking for the duration of Kellie's pregnancy, but soon finds it very difficult to keep his promise.  Meanwhile, Mimi has the hots for a handsome delivery man; and Oswald becomes part-owner of the Warsaw.

episodes.name: Michigan J. Gus
episodes.overview: Kellie's fears about Drew's inability to be a good father grow after Gus suddenly begins misbehaving every time he is around his uncle.  Inspired by Mimi's romance with a widower, Oswald and Lewis hope to set themselves for life by picking up wealthy widows.

episodes.name: Drew's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Kellie tries to convince Drew to become friends with a new neighbor, but it all blows up in her face when the man turns out to be a clingy pest who just will not leave Drew alone.

episodes.name: Arrivederci, Italy
episodes.overview: Drew turns to a shady travel agent for help when he is unable to put together the funds to finance Kellie's dream vacation in Italy.

episodes.name: House of the Rising Son-in-Law
episodes.overview: Kellie tries to get Drew and her father to overcome their differences by having them work together to fix up an old house for sale.  Mimi turns to Larry's matchmaking service in her quest to find a new man.

episodes.name: Dog Soup
episodes.overview: Drew tries to make some extra money for the baby by betting on a greyhound that has been enhanced as part of a DrugCo project.

episodes.name: Baby Face
episodes.overview: Drew has trouble getting romantic with Kellie after a photo of the baby puts a lot of very strange ideas in his head.

episodes.name: Assault with a Lovely Weapon
episodes.overview: Lewis is depressed due to breaking up with his girlfriend so Drew and Oswald take him to a strip club where he suffers a breast related injury. Drew gets caught lying to his girlfriend about the club when Lewis sues the dancer.

episodes.name: Love, Sri Lankan Style
episodes.overview: Drew receives a letter from Steve with a check to help since Mimi lives with him. He wants back with Mimi but she is dating Larry so Drew arranges a meeting. Then a one-night stand Steve had in his world travel arrives and Steve tells Mimi.

episodes.name: Knot in the Mood
episodes.overview: Drew puts his plan to propose to Kellie on hold when he finds out her parents are getting a divorce.

episodes.name: The Passion of the Wick
episodes.overview: Drew comes up with a plan to open a retro store, and seeks a partnership with the now-wealthy Wick.  However, all of Wick's funds come through his father-in-law, so Drew must help cover up Wick's extra-marital affair or lose his financial backing.

episodes.name: Finale
episodes.overview: Kellie finally agrees to marry Drew, but their wedding plans are thrown into disarray when she goes into labor.

episodes.name: Girlfriend, Interrupted
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of his disastrous marriage, Drew heads off alone on his honeymoon to try to define his feelings for Kellie.  Oswald and Lewis head to Mexico ahead of Drew, where Oswald accidentally falls for a hooker, unaware of her identity because he doesn't know how to speak Spanish.
